events.message: We have received the candidate's application for the Software Engineer role, including their resume and cover letter expressing strong interest.
The application has been categorized under the Engineering cluster based on keywords like software engineer and development experience.
A recruiter experienced in engineering positions has been assigned to manage this candidate's recruitment process.
Conducted an initial screening call with the candidate to discuss their background and confirm technical skills proficiency.
The candidate responded promptly and enthusiastically to the screening follow-up, confirming availability for interviews.
A technical interview with the engineering team has been scheduled for next week to assess coding and system design abilities.
